reviewtext: I got sick and tired of the flaky wireless connection for my PS3 and Xbox 360. I don't have a hardwire ethernet connection in the game room so I bought an Actiontec Powerlink ethernet connection twin pack..(runs ethernet over your home's power lines). Anyway...I have a power link module, PS3, and Xbox360 connected to the Netgear FS105 Switch and everything works perfectly.
summary: Does the job. Using with PS3/Xbox360
